name: Patero
description: There are five of us and Patero is our common nest. We come from Logio and we want to improve the world around us. We are all different and we have a simple rule in our genes that when everything comes together in the right proportion, at the right time, in the right place and agrees on something in common, a unique combination is created that changes established principles. We founded our business on the principle of making complex things simpler and more efficient. We rid the world of unnecessary waste. Our mission is to make things nicer, make money and have fun doing it. We associate our business with clear ethical values. Sometimes we invest in a technological miracle and other times we invest in an approach that goes back to traditions and the natural way things work. We are not afraid to connect traditional fields with modern technologies and we believe that it is the merging of different contexts that leads to bigger and better wholes. If we set them up correctly step by step, then we can benefit from them for the whole society.

name: KAYA
description: KAYA is an early-stage VC fund with roots in CEE, investing in intrepid founders across Europe since 2010. KAYA VC predominantly invests at the seed stage, but there is a growing focus on pre-seed opportunities. They have co-created seven ventures so far and are always seeking new studio projects. Even if an idea is still in its early stages, it is not too early to engage with them. For Seed+, Series A/A+, and businesses with revenue ranging from 0 to €5 million, they are open to making an initial investment. Recognizing the uniqueness of each situation, their initial investment can range from €100,000 to €3 million. KAYA VC has the capacity to invest over €20 million per company over time, leveraging their flagship fund and LPs. They prioritize potential over ownership percentages, preferring to hold 5% of a future unicorn rather than none.
